forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
The air in Downtown San Francisco feels refreshingly crisp as the morning unfolds, bathed in the soft glow of early sunlight filtering through a mostly sunny sky. The temperature rests comfortably around 64, teasing both warmth and the welcome coolness that the marine layer often brings in this coastal city. Winds, gentle yet determined, race from the west southwest at speeds of up to 24 mph, carrying with them a lively vivacity, setting the stage for an invigorating day. 

As the day stretches on, it will gracefully transition to a pleasantly clear evening, with a low hovering around a cozy 53. A gentle reminder from the breeze suggests dressing in layers; a light jacket might be ideal for those moments when the wind whispers cooler notes along the waterfront or in the famed Haight. Whether you decide to wander through local shops, savor a warm cup of coffee at a cozy café, or perhaps find a quiet corner in one of the city’s parks, the day feels rich with possibilities. For those who seek, the beauty of this moment lies in the soft interplay of sunlight and shadow, perfect for a reflective stroll along the Embarcadero as the sun begins to dip beyond the horizon.
